Mock c ⇒ GenEnv (AlonzoEra c) → UTxO (AlonzoEra c) → PParams (AlonzoEra c) → SlotNo → Set (TxIn c) → StrictSeq (TxOut (AlonzoEra c)) → StrictSeq (TxCert (AlonzoEra c)) → Withdrawals c → Coin → StrictMaybe (Update (AlonzoEra c)) → StrictMaybe (AuxiliaryDataHash c) → Gen (TxBody (AlonzoEra c), [Script (AlonzoEra c)])

display_html:
data TranslationInstance era = TranslationInstance {
  • tiProtVer ∷ ProtVer
  • tiLanguage ∷ Language
  • tiUtxo ∷ UTxO era
  • tiTx ∷ Tx era
  • tiResult ∷ VersionedTxInfo
}
name: TranslationInstance TranslationInstance tiProtVer tiLanguage tiUtxo tiTx tiResult

display_html: deserializeTranslationInstances ∷ ∀ era. (Era era, DecCBOR (PParams era), DecCBOR (UTxO era), DecCBOR (Annotator (Tx era))) ⇒ ByteString → Either DecoderError [TranslationInstance era]
name: deserializeTranslationInstances

display_html:
class EraTx era ⇒ TranslatableGen era where
  • tgRedeemers ∷ Gen (Redeemers era)
  • tgTx ∷ Language → Gen (Tx era)
  • tgUtxo ∷ Language → Tx era → Gen (UTxO era)
  • mkTxInfoLanguage ∷ HasCallStack ⇒ Language → TxInfoLanguage era
name: TranslatableGen tgRedeemers tgTx tgUtxo mkTxInfoLanguage

display_html:
data TxInfoLanguage era where
  • TxInfoLanguage ∷ EraPlutusTxInfo l era ⇒ SLanguage l → TxInfoLanguage era
name: TxInfoLanguage TxInfoLanguage
